name: ListOrganizationMembershipsCalendly
description:
Retrieve organization memberships and associated details.

Use this tool to list organization memberships for users within an organization. You can either look up a user's membership or find all users in the organization. This tool also retrieves the organization's URI.

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token to fetch the next or previous set of results in the collection.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: number_of_rows_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of organization membership records to return.

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: filter_by_email
parameters.description: Filter results to include members with the specified email address.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.name: filter_by_organization
parameters.description: Filter results to include only members from a specified organization by its identifier.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by organization

parameters.name: filter_by_user
parameters.description: Filter results by a specific user's email address or ID.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by user

parameters.name: filter_by_role
parameters.description: Filter results by role: owner, admin, or user.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by role

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.
